mapper.update: update orders set order_state='구매확정' where DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) >= DATE(order_process) and order_state='발송완료';
mapper.select: select order_num, order_cusid, order_prdcode, order_prdname, order_prdsize, order_amount, order_receiver, order_tel, order_addr, order_price, order_state, order_memo, order_regdate, order_delivcomp, order_delivnum, order_usepoint, order_process from orders where ${fieldName} like '%${searchWord}%' and (date(order_regdate) between '${sdate}' and '${edate}') order by order_regdate desc limit ${page}, 10;
select count(*) from orders where ${fieldName} like '%${searchWord}%' and (date(order_regdate) between '${sdate}' and '${edate}');
select count(*) from orders where ${fieldName} like '%${searchWord}%' and (date(order_regdate) between '${sdate}' and '${edate}') and order_state in ('취소요청','취소완료');
select sum(order_price) from orders where ${fieldName} like '%${searchWord}%' and (date(order_regdate) between '${sdate}' and '${edate}');
select sum(order_price) from orders where ${fieldName} like '%${searchWord}%' and (date(order_regdate) between '${sdate}' and '${edate}') and order_state in ('취소완료');
select count(*) from orders where order_state='결제완료';
select count(*) from orders where order_state='취소요청';

select s.order_prdcode, p.prd_name, s.order_220, s.order_225, s.order_230, s.order_235, s.order_240, s.order_245, s.order_250, s.order_255, s.order_260, s.order_265, s.order_270, s.order_275, s.order_280, s.order_285, s.order_290 from stock as s left join product as p on s.order_prdcode = p.prd_code where order_prdcode in (${pick})
select count(*) from stock as s left join product as p on s.order_prdcode = p.prd_code where order_prdcode in (${pick})
mapper.insert: insert into stock(order_220, order_225, order_230, order_235, order_240, order_245, order_250, order_255, order_260, order_265, order_270, order_275, order_280, order_285, order_290 ) values (#{order_220}, #{order_225}, #{order_230}, #{order_235}, #{order_240}, #{order_245}, #{order_250}, #{order_255}, #{order_260}, #{order_265}, #{order_270}, #{order_275}, #{order_280}, #{order_285}, #{order_290})
